articles.title: Leaked videos show Lenovo’s first gaming smartphone - The Verge
articles.description: Videos of what appear to be the Lenovo Legion gaming phone, Lenovo’s first Android gaming phone, have surfaced online. The videos indicate that the phone will feature fast 90W wired charging and a 5,000mAh dual-cell battery.
